Room.Name: Lankshire Parkway
Room.ShortDescription: You are walking along Lankshire Parkway, north of Golden Dolphin Way.
Room.LongDescription: Lankshire Parkway intersects Golden Dolphin Way ahead to the south. Golden Dolphin Way marks the southern border of Oceancrest. You can see the large City Walls looming in the background. On the east side of the road are the various Oceancrest silos and grannaries, used to store the unused wheat and corn from the fields for the colder winter months.
